field.name: point_subtype
field.label: COM_TRAVELENTITY_POINT_FIELD_SUBTYPE_LABEL
field.query: (select NULL AS value, 'NULL' as point_subtype from dollsfun_points.#__te_points) union (SELECT point_subtype_id AS value, CONCAT(point_class_name,' -> ',point_type_name,' -> ',point_subtype_name) as point_subtype FROM dollsfun_points.#__te_point_subtypes,dollsfun_points.#__te_point_types,dollsfun_points.#__te_point_classes WHERE point_type=point_type_id AND point_class=point_class_id ORDER BY point_class_name,point_type_name,point_subtype_name)

field.name: point_settlement
field.label: COM_TRAVELENTITY_POINT_FIELD_SETTLEMENT_LABEL
field.query: (select NULL AS value, 'NULL' as point_settlement from dollsfun_points.#__te_points) union (SELECT settlement_id AS value, CONCAT(country_name,' -> ',region_name,' -> ',subregion_name,' -> ',settlement_name) as point_settlement FROM dollsfun_points.#__te_settlements, dollsfun_points.#__te_subregions, dollsfun_points.#__te_regions, dollsfun_points.#__te_countries WHERE settlement_subregion=subregion_id AND subregion_region=region_id AND region_country=country_id ORDER BY country_name,region_name,subregion_name,settlement_name)

field.name: point_parent
field.label: COM_TRAVELENTITY_POINT_FIELD_PARENT_LABEL
field.query: (select NULL AS value, 'NULL' as point_parent from dollsfun_points.#__te_points) union (SELECT point_id AS value, point_name as point_parent FROM dollsfun_points.#__te_points)
